Title: Health benefits of policies to reduce carbon emissions
Abstract: © Published by the BMJ Publishing Group Limited. For permission to use (where not already granted under a licence) please go to.James Milner and colleagues argue that carefully considered policies to lower carbon emissions can also improve health, and we should use these benefits to push for strong climate action
